PreventiveCareAgreement.name: PreventiveCareAgreement
PreventiveCareAgreement.description: Specifies the payment terms for contracts of Preventive Care Fee Agreement.

AdditionalInformation.description: Additional information on the bonus payout and target expectation.

BonusMeasureDescription.description: The description of the bonus measure type.

BonusMeasureType.description: The measure type used to define the bonus payout such as Preventive Readmission Rate and Preventive Admission Rate.

BonusPayout.description: The bonus paid on reaching the target measure percentage.

ContractPaymentAgreementId.description: The contract payment agreement record to which this preventive care fee agreement is associated.

CurrentMeasurePercent.description: The current percentage of the specified measure.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

Name.description: The name of the preventive care fee agreement.

TargetMeasurePercent.description: The expected percentage of the specified measure.
